title: eBay & web3 powered Digital Product Passports and what this could mean for the future of commerce?
description:
eBay is embracing web3 technologies to fulfil the vision of a truly connected product world. Digital Product Passports (DPPs) underpin this movement with a real world application of public blockchain technologies, tokenised products, attestation based technologies and selective disclosure schemes as the  technology of choice.

I will explore what this could mean for one of the world of ecommerce, why brands are embracing this movement and whats in it for the consumer.
